price: 95. Y, ciertamente, somos capaces de hacerte presenciar el castigo que les hemos prometido.
arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā ʿalā an nuriyaka mā naʿiduhum laqādirūna
